pageContext.claim: “When you look at what we've done in terms of Russia, I guarantee whoever it is in Russia, they're saying, ‘Oh, gee, do we wish that Trump was not the victor in that election.’”
pageContext.analysis: Russian President Vladimir Putin flat-out said July 16 that he wanted Trump to win. U.S. intelligence agencies found unanimously that Putin ordered a cyber espionage and propaganda campaign to help Trump's chances.
